title: T206 Clark Griffith Portrait - Price Drop

posts.post_title: T206 Clark Griffith Portrait - Price Drop
posts.post_content:
This is an obviously trimmed example of Clark's portrait, but still a nice card for cheap.  Asking $30.00 delivered for it.  Paypal only (no fees, Family and Friends option).  Please PM me if interested.  Thanks a lot.

AndyH
